alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 8:13PM CDT until March 26 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Pulaski and Laclede Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, flood waters affect the water intake at the Ft. Wood Water Treatment Plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
